vision.notes: Visual capabilities of Daesiidae are currently unknown based on the provided data.

mechanoreception.notes: As solifugids, Daesiidae likely rely heavily on mechanoreception for detecting vibrations and tactile information from their environment. This inference is based on the general sensory ecology of related solifuges.

chemoreception.notes: Chemoreception is likely important for prey detection and navigation, inferred from other arachnids and solifuges.
